content:
Thank you so much for your encouragement and guidance! I'm feeling more confident and prepared to lead this workshop now. I completely agree with you that sharing personal reflections and experiences can be a powerful way to illustrate the practical applications of forgiveness and gratitude. It's all about being authentic, vulnerable, and respectful of the group's time and energy.

I'll definitely keep my sharing concise and focused on the lessons learned, and use "I" statements to express my thoughts and feelings. I want to create a safe and supportive environment where attendees feel comfortable sharing their own stories and struggles.

I'm excited to see how the workshop unfolds too! I'm looking forward to facilitating a meaningful and transformative experience for the attendees. Thank you again for your help and support. You've been an invaluable resource throughout this process.
